commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<style>
    .img-container {
        text-align: center; 
    }
    .img-responsive {
        width: 80px; 
        height: auto;
    }

    .img-services{
        width: 200px; 
        height: auto;
    }


    #categories .row {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
    }

    #categories .col-md-3 {
        flex: 1 1 10%; 
        max-width: 10%;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        padding: 10px; 
    }

    #categories .col-md-3 img {
        width: 80%; 
        height: auto;
    }

    #categories .col-md-3 a {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        text-align: center;
        color: black; 
        text-decoration: none; 
    }

    #categories .col-md-3 a:hover {
        color: gray; 
    }

    #categories .col-md-3 h4 {
        margin: 0;
        font-size: 110%; 
    }


    #services {
    padding-top: 40px; 
    padding-bottom: 40px; 
    }

    #services .row {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    #services .col-md-3 {
        background-color: white; 
        border-radius: 10px; 
        padding: 15px; 
        box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); 
        margin: 10px; 
        flex: 1 1 calc(25% - 20px); 
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    #services .col-md-3 img {
        width: 40%; 
        height: auto;
        margin-bottom: 10px; 
    }

    #services h5 {
        font-size: 1.1em;
        margin-bottom: 8px; 
    }

    #services p {
        font-size: 0.85em; 
    }

    /* hiệu ứng chuyển đổi */
    #services .col-md-3 {
    transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s; 
    }

    #services .col-md-3:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px); /*di chuyển nhích lên*/
        box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); /*Bóng đậm*/
    }

    #footer {
    background-color: #f8f9fa; 
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px 0; /* Khoảng cách trên và dưới */
    }


</style>
